summary: The diff does not add the required static footer image asset, and the actual rendering of the moat/trees footer strip cannot be verified from the truncated AppShell.tsx snippet. The frontend-file-summaries.txt also claims multiple unrelated feature changes that are not evidenced by the diff (only 3 files were modified).

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate a new decorative footer background graphic (moat/trees) and add it as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/moat-trees-footer-banner.dim_1600x300.png.
missing_requirements.reason: No new files were added in the diff, and there is no evidence that the required PNG was created at the specified path.

missing_requirements.requirement: Render the new moat-and-trees footer graphic as a full-width bottom-of-page visual element on all routed tab pages, positioned above the global footer, responsive and non-overlapping.
missing_requirements.reason: The AppShell.tsx diff is truncated before any footer rendering is shown, and the required image asset is not present in the diff, so the end-to-end requirement (rendering that specific image) cannot be confirmed as implemented.

hallucinated_features.description: Claims of updates across many frontend files (proposalContent, multiple pages, hooks/useQueries polling support, ordering changes, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: The diff summary shows only 3 modified files (AppShell.tsx, frontend-file-summaries.txt, project_state.json). There is no evidence those other files were actually changed in this diff; the claims appear only as descriptions inside frontend-file-summaries.txt.

hallucinated_features.description: Optional polling support added to LeadershipWordPatternsSummary, MicroSolutionsCommunityList, and React Query hooks plus micro-solution ordering reversal and optimistic cache updates.
hallucinated_features.reason: These are described in frontend-file-summaries.txt, but there is no corresponding diff content for the referenced files (they are not listed as modified).

hallucinated_features.description: SessionOutlinePage placeholder returning null and routing changes removing a Session Outline route.
hallucinated_features.reason: Described in frontend-file-summaries.txt, but there is no evidence in the diff that App.tsx or SessionOutlinePage.tsx were modified (not listed among modified files).
